column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My girlfriend and I sat on the patio and the service was good out there
column2: though we failed to read anything that would have warned us the food takes 35-40 minutes or else we would have planned our day better and not gotten so annoyed by the wait.  Once the food came
column3: I will admit I devoured it.  Again
column4: it's not that it wasn't good
column5: it's just that you walk in expecting to be floored and really struggle with the idea of NY v. Chicago pizza.  There is no struggle
